          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">El nombre de los huesos 1</string>
            <string language="en">The names of bones 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Namen von Knochen 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les noms des os 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os nomes dos ossos 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I nomi delle ossa 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα ονόματα των κόκκαλων 1</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno debe buscar los nombres de unos huesos que aparecen señalados en la imagen de la página.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student most look for the names of some bones which are marked on the image shown on the page.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Huesos</string>
            <string language="en">bones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer am meisten 
nach den Namen einiger Knochen suchen, die auf dem Bild gekennzeichnet
werden, das auf der Seite gezeigt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant recherchent 
plus les noms de quelques os qui sont marqués sur l'image montrée à
la page.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante procura mais os nomes
de alguns ossos que são marcados na imagem mostrada na página.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo più cerca i nomi di 
alcune ossa che sono contrassegnate sull'immagine indicata alla 
pagina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής ψάχνει πιό πολύ τα 
ονόματα μερικών κόκκαλων που είναι χαρακτηρισμένα στην εικόνα 
που εμφανίζεται στη σελίδα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Knochen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">os</string>
